citations.narrative:
There was no one available during business hours to allow APHIS Officials to enter and inspect the facilities,
property, records, and animals on26-JUL-17 at 10:30 am.I reached the Director of Animal Welfare and Research
Integrity by phone. She stated that she was out at a meeting and there was no one in the office that day who could
meet me and give access.
A copy of the report will be emailed and sent by regular mail to the Director of Animal Welfare and Research
Integrity.
